name: Batman
info: He's freaking Batman. What else needs to be said?

name: Superman
info: A god. You see him coming down the street, you go the other way.

name: The Flash
info: Formerly known as the fastest man alive. Now known as the dumbest man alive.  Currently on the run from Zoom.

name: The Green Arrow
info: Unmatched marksmenship. He will save this city.

name: Aquaman
info: Can hold his breath for a really, really long time.
